virtual_margin.description: Extra margin that allows the IS algorithm to operate on a margin that is larger than the actual physical margin provided by the sensor. (sum of both sides).
virtual_margin.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

focal_length.description: Focal length in pixel unitsFocal length in pixel units for 1080p. This value is scaled for other resolutions.
focal_length.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

gyro_frequency.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

gyro_noise_floor.description: Gyro noise floor. Effective for EIS2 only.
gyro_noise_floor.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

gyro_pixel_scale.description: Scale factor to convert degree of rotation (yaw and pitch) to pixels. Effective for EIS2 only.
gyro_pixel_scale.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_1.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_2.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_3.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_4.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_5.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_6.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_7.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_8.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_9.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_param_10.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_lut_param_1_tab.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

res_lut_param_2_tab.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_offset_1.description: offset to adjust the 3D shake gyro interval start/end times to better align with the frame. (Offset between gyro timing and sof timing in ms).
s3d_offset_1.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_offset_2.description: offset to adjust the 3D shake gyro interval start/end times to better align with the frame. (Offset between gyro timing and sof timing in ms).
s3d_offset_2.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_offset_3.description: offset to adjust the 3D shake gyro interval start/end times to better align with the frame. (Offset between gyro timing and sof timing in ms).
s3d_offset_3.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_offset_4.description: offset to adjust the 3D shake gyro interval start/end times to better align with the frame. (Offset between gyro timing and sof timing in ms).
s3d_offset_4.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_threshold_1.description: threshold whereby exposure times above and below this threshold results in a different offset getting applied to the 3D shake gyro time interval. Thresholding for deciding s3d_offset based on integration time in seconds).
s3d_threshold_1.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_threshold_2.description: threshold whereby exposure times above and below this threshold results in a different offset getting applied to the 3D shake gyro time interval. Thresholding for deciding s3d_offset based on integration time in seconds).
s3d_threshold_2.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_threshold_3.description: threshold whereby exposure times above and below this threshold results in a different offset getting applied to the 3D shake gyro time interval. Thresholding for deciding s3d_offset based on integration time in seconds).
s3d_threshold_3.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

s3d_threshold_4_ext.description: threshold whereby exposure times above and below this threshold results in a different offset getting applied to the 3D shake gyro time interval. Thresholding for deciding s3d_offset based on integration time in seconds).
s3d_threshold_4_ext.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

rs_offset_1.description: offset to adjust the 3D shake gyro interval start/end times to better align with the frame. (Offset between gyro timing and sof timing in ms).
rs_offset_1.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.

rs_threshold_1.additional_notes: Constant: no dynamic configuration even when control variable change.
